Name: Grape Expectations
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprigs bouquet.
POUR all ingredients into a chilled glass.
Two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice and SWIZZLE .
Fill glass with more crushed ice.
Garnish and serve with a straw.
Review: A sauvignon blanc wine, rose liqueur, apple and lemon brandy-based swizzle. Fruity, floral and refreshing.
History: Created in 2015 by Ehren Khoo-Steel at The Blind Pig in St Helier, Jersey.
Nutrition: One serving of Grape Expectations contains 208 calories
